p1.title: Booking Platform — Prime Barber
p1.desc: Online bookings with admin panel, service/schedule management and responsive UI.
features: Bookings with service, barber, date and time selection

p2.title: AirFast — Android App
p2.desc: AirFast — Android app for flight booking. Complete solution with search, reservation, and profile management.
features: Search flights by origin and destination
deploy: Web: React + TypeScript + Node.js + MySQL (free hosting)

p3.title: Recipe Website (PHP + MySQL)
p3.desc: Recipe CRUD platform to explore traditional dishes from CPLP countries. Includes login, shopping cart, and dynamic filters.
features: Dynamic recipe listing with image, description and price
Responsive layout with banners and custom cards
